text: Mark off the width and height of the picture. Add guidelines for Toshiro‘s body. Draw his head. Add a line, which will act as the center of it.
Add guidelines for Hitsugaya’s arms, ears and facial features.
Outline the shapes of the character’s clothes. Define places for his hair and eyes.
Draw Toshiro’s locks and pleats on his clothes. Add his eyes.
Add more clothes. Detail the hair by adding new locks. Draw Toshiro’s irises and eyebrows.
Work on the whole figure, paying special attention to detail.
Contour Toshiro Hitsugaya, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Add more detail. Erase all guidelines.
